author: legozander
title: good little matoran:)
review: Matoro is a cool little matoran and i like him a lot. He has cool icy blue colour kopaka mask,hands and feet. I like his kolhi stick but the ball is not at all like a kolhi ball but thats not too bad though. Overall matoro is a good little matoran:)

author: iceinatorKoPaKa
title: Matoro is great.
review:
Matoro is the coolest matoran.
I like him because he's like Kopaka.
I gave it a 4 because of the weird kohlii "ball". And it does have the cool colored legs and mask. The kohlii stick itself is cool. The top of it is cool because it holds the "ball".

author: Gus_263
title: A classic matoran
review: One of my favorites, a courageous matoran that was a translator and turns in toa sacrificing himself to save the great spirict. In his matoran form of kohlii player is also a good set, but don't moves very well. The mask is the same of kopaka with a great color. He isn't showed in the movie, but he is coolest than some showed in it.

author: KLOKRIECHER
title: LEGO BIONICLE (Matoran) - Matoro Review
review:
This is a good figure to have and it's fun to play with as well.

Box/Instructions

The instruction has only 2 pages and there're no mistakes in it.

Parts

This set has 25 pieces and it was 4 USD when it was on sale. That means that the price per piece ratio was 16 cents per piece which is a really good value for what we get here.

The build

The build is very nice and easy and we also don't need to worry about stickers.

The completed model

[img]http://www.klokriecher.de/gallery_pics/l/8582-1.jpg[/img]


The arms, the hands the legs and the feet can be moved. On the back of the torso is a gear which you can use to move the torso to the right and/or to the left. This figure also has a hockey stick with a puck in it. I really like this figure - even if it doesn't do much.

Summary

All in all this set is an great set and I would recommend you to get this. You can find this set on eBay, BrickLink and Amazon for sure. Here is the link where you can check out the full gallery I made for this set on my website: http://www.klokriecher.de


Videos I made of this set:

Stopmotion

Review
